name: Bingo Country Boys -Bingo Live
description:
Bingo Country Boys is the most addictive & hot Bingo!

Play your way through the game and unlock exciting new episodes with sexy country boys.Win huge rewards and Earn Experience Points (XP) to move up in the tournaments.
Earn special awards as you complete a new episode.

FEATURES

Tournament-style play
A lot of amazing episodes to collect
High-quality graphics
Compete with thousands of people around the globe in real-time multiplayer
Awesome boosters will help you to win back-to-back tournaments
Live chat with players
An amazing community
Free app updates

PLEASE NOTE! Bingo Country Boys is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money.
This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling."

Support
